paragraphs.title: Adding Dependencies
paragraphs.text:
%spark.dep
z.reset() // clean up previously added artifact and repository
// add artifact recursively
z.load("org.mongodb.spark:mongo-spark-connector_2.11:2.4.0")

import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import com.mongodb.spark._
import com.mongodb.spark.config._
import org.bson.Document
import org.apache.spark.SparkConf

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import com.mongodb.spark._
import com.mongodb.spark.config._
import org.bson.Document
import org.apache.spark.SparkConf

paragraphs.text:
val spark = SparkSession.builder()
      .master("local")
      .appName("SparkWithMongoDb")
      .config("spark.mongodb.input.uri", "mongodb://172.17.0.2/test.characters")
      .config("spark.mongodb.input.readPreference.name", "primaryPreferred")
      .config("spark.mongodb.output.uri", "mongodb://172.17.0.2/test.characters")
      .getOrCreate() 
val sc = spark.sparkContext

paragraphs.text:
// We will drop '_id' column which is mongo primary key.

val orders = spark.read.format("com.mongodb.spark.sql").options(ordersReadConfig.asOptions).load().drop("_id")
val categories = spark.read.format("com.mongodb.spark.sql").options(categoriesReadConfig.asOptions).load().drop("_id")
val customers = spark.read.format("com.mongodb.spark.sql").options(customersReadConfig.asOptions).load().drop("_id")
val departments = spark.read.format("com.mongodb.spark.sql").options(departmentsReadConfig.asOptions).load().drop("_id")
val order_items = spark.read.format("com.mongodb.spark.sql").options(order_itemsReadConfig.asOptions).load().drop("_id")
val products = spark.read.format("com.mongodb.spark.sql").options(productsReadConfig.asOptions).load().drop("_id")

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select c.category_name, count(order_item_quantity) as count
from order_items oi
inner join products p on oi.order_item_product_id = p.product_id
inner join categories c on c.category_id = p.product_category_id
group by c.category_name
order by count desc
limit 10

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select p.product_id, p.product_name, r.revenue
from products p inner join
(select oi.order_item_product_id, sum(cast(oi.order_item_subtotal as float)) as revenue
from order_items oi inner join orders o
on oi.order_item_order_id = o.order_id
where o.order_status <> 'CANCELED'
and o.order_status <> 'SUSPECTED_FRAUD'
group by order_item_product_id) r
on p.product_id = r.order_item_product_id
order by r.revenue desc
limit 10
